Reference text: Jérémie Werner, Gizem Nogay, Florent Sahli, Terry Chien-Jen Yang, Matthias Bräuninger, Gabriel Christmann, Arnaud Walter, Brett A. Kamino, Peter Fiala, Philipp Löper, Sylvain Nicolay, Quentin Jeangros, Bjoern Niesen and Christophe Ballif, 'Complex Refractive Indices of Cesium–Formamidinium-Based Mixed-Halide Perovskites with Optical Band Gaps from 1.5 to 1.8 eV', ACS Energy Letters 3, pp.742-747, (2018)
Details: Cesium-formamidinium mixed-halide perovskite with optical bandwidth of 1.67 eV.
